# ui.page_output { #shiny.ui.page_output }

`ui.page_output(id)`

Create a page container where the entire body is a UI output.

## Parameters

<code><span class="parameter-name">id</span><span class="parameter-annotation-sep">:</span> <span class="parameter-annotation">[str](`str`)</span></code>

:   An output id.

## Returns

| Type                   | Description                                                 |
|------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------|
| [Tag](`htmltools.Tag`) | A UI element which is meant to be used as a page container. |
